frontmatter.title: Modino.io - Cybersecurity STARtup Award at 2023
frontmatter.tile_title: Modino.io won the prestigious European Cybersecurity STARtup Award at 2023 Cyber Investor Days
frontmatter.summary: The second Polish edition of Cyber Investor Days was organized by European Cyber Security Organisation (ECSO), #CyberMadeInPoland Cluster and Women4Cyber, and took place on the 21-22 June in Katowice, Poland. During the first day, Modino.io, represented by Business Development Manager Pawel Zebrowski presented his innovative idea to the public and jury and together with company CyCommSec won the content for the best startup during Cyber Investor Days.
frontmatter.meta_description: Modino.io has become one of the Cybersecurity STARtup Award winners. Learn more about the event.
